model.shaders.skybox

Class SkyboxShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.shaders.ShaderProgram
      • model.shaders.skybox.SkyboxShader

  • public class SkyboxShader
extends ShaderProgram
    Class to handle the open GL bindings for the skybox shader program
